text: Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses, “Au ga llingi iha gi goodou agu palaawaa mai i di langi. Nia laangi huogodoo, nia daangada gii hula gi ogohia nadau meegai ala e dohu ang gi ginaadou i lodo di laangi e dahi, idimaa Au e hagamada digaula be digaula e hagalongo gi agu haganoho be deeai.16.4 John 6.31
